<strong>About Me</strong>

Hey there! I'm an experienced Data Science professional with a passion for leveraging advanced technologies like Data Mining, Data Visualization, Generative AI, Large Language Models (LLMs), and Machine Learning to solve real-world problems. I have a strong academic background complemented by over a year of industry experience. I'm eager to continue contributing to groundbreaking advancements in AI and Data Science. Lastly, I have a passion for sports and healthy living, and I also love contributing to volunteer work.
